full_summary:
**Furniture for Interior Fit-up Project - Canadian Coast Guard College**

**Project Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking bids from suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the Canadian Coast Guard College in Sydney, Nova Scotia. The delivery deadline is October 1, 2022.

**Tender Details**

* Invitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Contract Value: To be determined based on bid submissions
* Language of Bid: Either official language of Canada (English or French)
* Bid Submission Deadline: August 30, 2022, 1:00 PM AT (Atlantic Time)
* Notice URL: [Website URL to obtain the bid documents]

**Eligibility Requirements**

* Suppliers must be pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement by the Public Service Agency, Canada.
* Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

**Bid Documents**

* The bid documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and bid forms, can be obtained from the Canada Business Network (CBN) website or from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.
* The bid documents must be submitted electronically through the GETS website.

**Contact Information**

* Justin Clow, Contracting Authority
* Email: [justin.clow@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:justin.clow@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (902) 111-1111
* Fax: (902) 496-5016

**Notice Type**

* This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. 
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please make sure to review the bid documents carefully before submitting your bid. We appreciate your interest in this project and look forward to reviewing your bid.
